home.welcome-description: On this website, you will find a selection of my most notable web development projects, information about myself, and details on how to contact me.

blog.title: Blog API
blog.details: A full-stack blog application built with Next JS for the front-end and Express JS for the back-end.
list: Created a REST API as the back-end using Express JS.

shopping.title: Shopping Cart
shopping.details: An e-commerce front-end application constructed with React and Next JS.
list: Utilized Next.js for routing and optimizing images and fonts.
Implemented React context to avoid prop drilling.

memory.title: Memory Game
memory.details: A memory game front-end application developed with React.
list: Learned how to use React hooks and lifecycle methods.

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.details: A personal portfolio front-end application, built with Astro.
list: Utilized Astro for routing and minimizing the shipping of unused JS.

about.title: About
about.content:
Hi there! My name is Fábio Rodrigues. I am a 25-year-old self-taught developer with a passion for continuously learning and expanding my skillset. I have been learning web development since May 2022 and have been using the curriculum "The Odin Project" as a guide for my studies.

I have a strong interest in technology and how it can be utilized to solve problems and improve people's lives. During the COVID-19 pandemic, I decided to take the opportunity to pursue my passion for web development and have since gained proficiency in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

In addition to my studies, I enjoy staying active through activities such as hiking and spending time with my friends and family. In my free time, I am an avid reader and enjoy playing video games.

I am always seeking new opportunities to apply my skills and grow as a developer. Thank you for considering me for potential opportunities and challenges.
